titles.title: Hallways to Health Care Act
A bill to provide additional funding for school-based health centers, and for other purposes.
Hallways to Health Care Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Hallways to Health Care Act
This bill provides FY2022 funding for grants and other activities to support school-based health centers. It also establishes within the Department of Health and Human Services a demonstration program for expanding telehealth services in school-based health centers.
